A

actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class Snake.src.GamePanel
Everytime there an action it moves the snake and checks for collisions if the game isn't over it will repaint the game

C

checkApple() - Method in class Snake.src.GamePanel
This method checks if the Snake has eaten the apple, if so the snake gets bigger, the score increases and another apple is spawned
checkCollisions() - Method in class Snake.src.GamePanel
This function will check collisions beteween the snake's head with the body and all the borders of the screen

D

draw(Graphics) - Method in class Snake.src.GamePanel
Calls the gameOver functions when the game isn't running anymore and also paints the snake blocks Also this method is used to paint lines to guide the user (if wanted)

G

GameFrame - Class in Snake.src
Does the JFrame necessary to the game
gameOver(Graphics) - Method in class Snake.src.GamePanel
Displays the GAME OVER text with the current score, high score of the user and a button to play again
